title: Game Progress Route
content:
er friend Roger Highberry. However, Meztli interrupts, offering a solo tasting to Cora. She declines, preferring company. You sense the poison in Meztli's offered wine. Choose:

Cora, that wine is poisonous. This man wants to harm you. I'll gladly take a glass, Master Meztli. I'll have to pass, but enjoy your wine. Let Master Meztli try the wine first, or should I say Dolor? Attack the poisoner.

Opt for the first choice. Meztli speaks briefly and threatens you before a battle ensues. Afterward,
